Class.name: Custom.QUESTIONNAIREQSWHSTTIA
Class.ViewQuery: SELECT ID AS ROWID, Q1 AS PrimaryDiagnosis, Q2 AS EDPresentaionDate, Q3 AS DateOfStrokeTIA, Q4 AS EDPresentationTime, Q5 AS TimeOfStroke, Q6 AS Age, Q7 AS Sex, Q8 AS AdmissionSource, Q9 AS CurrentRiskFactors, Q10 AS RankinScore, Q11 AS TransferToAnotherHospitalFromED, Q12 AS TransferredTo, Q13 AS TransferDate, Q14 AS TransferTime, Q15 AS DateOfWardAdmission, Q16 AS TimeOfWardAdmission, Q17 AS PhysiotherapyAssessmentWithin1DayOfAdmission, Q18 AS OccupationalTherapyAssessmentWithin1DayOfAdmission, Q19 AS SpeechPathologistAssessmentWithin1DayOfAdmission, Q20 AS DocumentationOfSwallowingAbilityWithin24hrsOfArrivalAtHospital, Q21 AS BrainImagingWithCTOrMRIScanWithin12hrsOfArrivalAtHospital, Q22 AS AClinicalPlanExistsToAvoidComplications, Q23 AS AClinicalPlanPromotesUrinaryContinence, Q24 AS PatientIsContinent, Q25 AS CommencementorContinuationOfAspirinForPatientsWithThromboticOrThromboemoblicStrokeWITHIN24HRSOFADMISSION, Q26 AS MultidisciplinaryTeamMeetingWithCarerAndorPatientWithin7DaysOfAdmission, Q27 AS TimelyAndInformativeProvisionOfADischargeSummarywithin1DayOfSeparationdischarge, Q28 AS CommencementorContinuationOfAspirinForPatientsWithThromboticOrThromboembolicStrokeByDayOfSeparation, Q29 AS SecondaryPrevention, Q30 AS CarotidDuplexdateAndTime, Q31 AS LipidsdateAndTime, Q32 AS GlucoseDateAndTime, Q33 AS Fever2RecordedTemperatures385InFirst48hrs, Q34 AS WasItActivelyManaged, Q35 AS Hyperglycaemia1RecordedBSL12mmollIn24hrPeriod, Q36 AS WasItActivelyManaged, Q37 AS Other, Q38 AS SeparationDateFromAcuteUnit, Q39 AS Rankin, Q40 AS Destination, Q41 AS ConsentForCommunityFollowUpByStrokeLiaisonStaffPostDischarge, Q42 AS ASelfManagementCarePlanOnSeparation, Q43 AS CTPerformed, Q44 AS CTTime, Q45 AS Thrombolysis, Q46 AS ThrombolysisTime, Q47 AS TypeOfStroke, Q48 AS Hospital, QUESDate AS DateUpdated, QUESTime AS TimeUpdated, QUESUserDR->SSUSR_RowId AS UserUpdated, QUESCreateDate AS DateCreated, QUESCreateTime AS TimeCreated, QUESCreateUserDR->SSUSR_RowId AS UserCreated, QUESScore AS Score, QUESStatusDR AS Status FROM questionnaire.QSWHSTTIA
